member.name: M:Form.Orm.deleteWhere``1(Form.Attributes.OrmState,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Data.Common.DbTransaction},System.String)
member.Warning: Running this function is equivalent to DELETE FROM table WHERE whereClause

member.name: M:Form.Orm.generateReader(Form.Attributes.OrmState,System.String)
member.Description: Takes a function of IDataReader -> Result< 't seq, exn> (see FORMs consumeReader function as example) to transfer the results of executing the specified sql against the specified database given by state into an arbitrary type 't, defined by you in the readerFunction.

member.name: M:Form.Orm.consumeReader``1(Form.Attributes.OrmState,System.Data.IDataReader)
member.Description: Takes a reader of type IDataReader and a state of type OrmState -> consumes the reader and returns a sequence of type ^T.

member.name: P:Form.Orm._toOptions
member.summary: **Do not use.** This is internal to Form and cannot be hidden due to inlining. We make no promises your code won't break in the future if you use this.

member.name: M:Form.Orm.connect(Form.Attributes.OrmState)
